00033 
00034 #include "par_kmedoids.h"
00035 
00036 #include <cstdlib>
00037 #include <stdint.h>
00038 #include <sys/time.h>
00039 using namespace std;
00040 
00041 #include "random.h"
00042 
00043 namespace cluster {
00044 
00045   par_kmedoids::par_kmedoids(MPI_Comm comm) 
00046     : par_partition(comm), 
00047       total_dissimilarity(numeric_limits<double>::infinity()),
00048       best_bic_score(0),
00049       init_size(40),
00050       max_reps(5),
00051       epsilon(1e-15)
00052   { }
00053 
00054 
00055   void par_kmedoids::set_epsilon(double e) {
00056     epsilon = e;
00057   }
00058 
00059 
00060   double par_kmedoids::average_dissimilarity() {
00061     int size;
00062     CMPI_Comm_size(comm, &size);
00063     return total_dissimilarity / size;
00064   }
00065 
00066   double par_kmedoids::bic_score() {
00067     return best_bic_score;
00068   }
00069 
00070   void par_kmedoids::seed_random_uniform(MPI_Comm comm) {
00071     int rank;
00072     CMPI_Comm_rank(comm, &rank);
00073 
00074     // same seed on all processes.
00075     uint32_t seed = get_time_seed();
00076     CMPI_Bcast(&seed, 1, MPI_INT, 0, comm);
00077     random.seed(seed);
00078   }
00079 
00080 } // namespace cluster
